rb_notes.editor:
{"ops":[{"insert":"Draw device note about ISIS configuration and highlight device and interface when ISIS process is turn on in this device.

"},{"attributes":{"color":"#0066cc"},"insert":"Output:"},{"insert":"
		Data unit items on device level:
			1) ISIS Neighbors Table

		Data unit items on interface level:
			1) Network Type
			2) ISIS Tag
			3) Level:
			4) Area ID
			5) System ID
			6) ISIS Nbrs Count

		Highlight items on device level:
			1) ISIS Device

		Draw notes on device level:
			1) ISIS Configuraiton
"}]}
rb_notes.text:
Draw device note about ISIS configuration and highlight device and interface when ISIS process is turn on in this device.

Output:
		Data unit items on device level:
			1) ISIS Neighbors Table

		Data unit items on interface level:
			1) Network Type
			2) ISIS Tag
			3) Level:
			4) Area ID
			5) System ID
			6) ISIS Nbrs Count

		Highlight items on device level:
			1) ISIS Device

		Draw notes on device level:
			1) ISIS Configuraiton

{"ops":[{"attributes":{"color":"#333333"},"insert":"This runbook is working for highlighting route protocol on the map, which contains OSPF, EIGRP, ISIS, Static Route, BGP, Redistribution. When device's route protocol is turning on, the related device and interface will be highlight, in this way, you will know network topology quickly."},{"insert":"

"},{"attributes":{"color":"#333333"},"insert":"1. Highlighting OSPF"},{"insert":"
"},{"attributes":{"color":"#333333"},"insert":"2. Highlighting EIGRP"},{"insert":"

rb_notes.text:
This runbook is working for highlighting route protocol on the map, which contains OSPF, EIGRP, ISIS, Static Route, BGP, Redistribution. When device's route protocol is turning on, the related device and interface will be highlight, in this way, you will know network topology quickly.

1. Highlighting OSPF
2. Highlighting EIGRP
3. Highlighting ISIS
4. Highlighting Static
5. Highlighting BGP
6. Highlighting Redistribution
